channel.title: CNN.com - RSS Channel
channel.description: CNN.com delivers up-to-the-minute news and information on the latest top stories, weather, entertainment, politics and more.
channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2024 Turner Broadcasting System, Inc. All Rights Reserved.

item.title: Israel and Hamas trade jabs over Gaza ceasefire proposal
item.description: A US-backed Israeli proposal for a ceasefire deal appears to be in limbo, with neither side yet publicly committing to the plan as talks continue. Hamas proposed changes to the deal while Israel is yet to formally endorse its own plan. Follow for live updates.

item.title: Hunter Biden found guilty on all counts in gun case
item.description: A federal jury found Hunter Biden guilty Tuesday on all three federal felony gun charges he faced.

item.title: As Equals: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: Find out more about As Equals, CNN's gender inequality series, and how you can get in touch with the team.

item.title: June 10, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: The UN Security Council adopted a resolution proposed by the United States for a permanent ceasefire and release of the hostages in Gaza.

item.title: Apple introduces AI to its products at WWDC
item.description: Apple introduced "Apple Intelligence" -- a suite of artificial intelligence tools -- to its products at its annual Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) on Monday, while announcing a host of Apple product updates.

item.title: Jury begins deliberations in Hunter Biden's federal gun trial
item.description: Jury deliberations began Monday and will resume tomorrow in Hunter Biden's federal gun trial in Delaware.

item.title: June 10, 2024 - Israel-Hamas war
item.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has called on Benny Gantz to change his mind after the key war carbinet member resigned from government over the handling of the war in Gaza.

item.title: News on the European election results 2024
item.description: Results will soon start rolling in after the European elections, one of the world's largest democratic exercises. Follow for live updates.

item.title: June 9, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: Key Israeli war cabinet member Benny Gantz quit Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's government Sunday. Meanwhile, the death toll from Israel's hostage rescue in central Gaza keeps rising. Follow for live updates.

item.title: June 8, 2024 - Israel-Gaza news
item.description: The Israeli military says it rescued four hostages from central Gaza on Saturday. Palestinians report scenes of horror on the ground, and Gaza hospital officials say more than 200 people were killed.

item.title: Biden makes the case for democracy after meeting with Zelensky
item.description: President Joe Biden apologized to Volodymyr Zelensky on Friday for aid delays from the US, telling the Ukrainian leader "we're not going to walk away from you."

item.title: Day 5 of Hunter Biden's federal gun trial
item.description: Hunter Biden's trial on gun charges is underway in Delaware. The president's son faces three charges in the case brought by the special counsel. Follow here for the latest live news updates.

item.title: Key takeaways from the blowout May jobs report
item.description: The US economy added a whopping 272,000 jobs in May, far more than expected. The unemployment rate rose to 4% from 3.9%.

item.title: June 6, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: Dozens of people were killed in an Israeli airstrike on a United Nations-run school in central Gaza, authorities said, in an attack that CNN analysis found was conducted with a US-made weapon.

item.title: Day 4 of Hunter Biden's federal gun trial
item.description: Day four of Hunter Biden's trial on gun charges in Delaware featured testimony from Hallie Biden. The president's son faces three charges in the case brought by a special counsel.

item.title: D-Day 80th anniversary in Normandy
item.description: World leaders visited the beaches of Normandy on Thursday to mark the 80th anniversary of D-Day.

item.title: 'The day has finally come': Years in the making, evidence leads investigators to Rex Heuermann
item.description: Rex Heuermann left his office near the Empire State Building and strolled down a still-bustling Fifth Avenue as the sun set on a hot Thursday evening in Manhattan.

item.title: What we know about the women known as the 'Gilgo Four'
item.description: Of the six women Rex Heuermann is accused of killing on Long Island, four of them were discovered bound with belts or tape and wrapped in burlap along a stretch of Gilgo Beach in 2010.

item.title: The Gilgo Beach killings suspect's wife unknowingly helped in his arrest. She's now filed for divorce
item.description: In her more than 27 years of marriage to Rex Heuermann, Asa Ellerup likely did not know about the gruesome double life her husband is accused of living, Suffolk County's top cop says.

item.title: 'Unintended hero.' A mother's quest to find her daughter led to the eventual arrest of suspect in Gilgo Beach serial killings
item.description: Beyond the string of murders and the long elusive hunt for a suspected serial killer is the Hamlet-like tragedy of a troubled family whose legacy may be helping solve what police called "one of the most consequential homicide investigations in the history of Long Island."

item.title: June 5, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: Tensions are ramping up at the Israel-Lebanon border, with Hezbollah claiming responsibility for a Wednesday evening attack in northern Israel that left multiple people injured.

item.title: Day 3 of Hunter Biden's federal gun trial
item.description: Hunter Biden's ex-wife and ex-girlfriend were on the stand Wednesday in his trial on federal gun charges.

item.title: Boeing launches first crewed Starliner spacecraft
item.description: A Boeing-built Starliner spacecraft, carrying two NASA astronauts, soared toward space on Wednesday. Follow for our live updates.

item.title: June 4, 2024 - Modi declares victory in India election as BJP party faces shock setbacks
item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will serve a third term in office after India's election authority confirmed the National Democratic Alliance coalition headed by his ruling Bharatiya Janata Party won the required 272 seats for a majority.

item.title: Hunter Biden gun trial opening statements
item.description: FBI special agent Erika Jensen, the first witness in Hunter Biden's trial on felony gun charges in Delaware, introduced key evidence Tuesday including text messages and photos taken from Biden's infamous laptop and other devices.

item.title: Biden announces executive action on immigration
item.description: President Joe Biden on Tuesday unveiled immigration actions to severely limit asylum-seeker crossings.

item.title: Attorney General Garland testifies at House Judiciary Committee
item.description: Attorney General Merrick Garland is testifying before the House Judiciary Committee today as a part of its annual oversight hearing. Follow for live updates.

item.title: Dare to bare: 24 of the world's best nude beaches
item.description: From big-city bays to secluded shores, there are hundreds of beaches where you can legally frolic while naked. If you're so inclined, strip off that bathing suit and enjoy 24 of the best nude beaches around the world.

item.title: Hunter Biden's trial on federal gun charges
item.description: A jury has been seated in Hunter Biden's trial on felony gun charges in Wilmington, Delaware. This is the first time in American history that the child of the sitting president is on trial.

item.title: Claudia Sheinbaum projected to be Mexico's first woman president
item.description: Claudia Sheinbaum is projected to win Mexico's presidential election and become the first woman to lead the country's government, according to preliminary results.
